title: Are WNBA players underpaid?
content: The average WNBA player got paid less than $80,000 in 2019â€“20, while the average NBA player earned $7.4 million in the same period.  That said, the NBA has far higher viewership ratings bringing in much more revenue for the league than the WNBA.

title: Ice Cube offer unique ownership opportunity in his BIG3 basketball league.
content: It's 21st century ownership. There are two ownership options totaling 1000 additions - 25 fire price at $25k each, and 975 gold price at $5k each.

title: Is the concussion protocol being followed in the NFL?
content: No look at Tua Tagovailoa, Dolphins needs to be sued!

title: What are the highest paid team sports for women?
content: Soccer and WNBA players have highest earnings. Female athletes tend to get paid more from individual sports such as tennis and golf.
